level.heading: Failure to appear.
level.text: Any person released pursuant to section 23-702 who fails to appear as required shall be punished by a fine not exceeding $5,000 or imprisonment for not more than five years, or both.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (July 29, 1970, 84 Stat. 632, Pub. L. 91-358, title II, ยง 210(a).)
